entry.sentence: After saying goodbye to the old lady , Rosemarie immediately went about selling the few belongings from her mother 's estate .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN After) (S (VP (VBG saying) (NP (NN goodbye)) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (JJ old) (NN lady)))))) (, ,) (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (ADVP (RB immediately)) (VP (VBD went) (PP (IN about) (S (VP (VBG selling) (NP (DT the) (JJ few) (NNS belongings)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (PRP$ her) (NN mother) (POS 's)) (NN estate))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: prepc_after(went-11, saying-2) dobj(saying-2, goodbye-3) det(lady-7, the-5) amod(lady-7, old-6) prep_to(saying-2, lady-7) nsubj(went-11, Rosemarie-9) advmod(went-11, immediately-10) root(ROOT-0, went-11) prepc_about(went-11, selling-13) det(belongings-16, the-14) amod(belongings-16, few-15) dobj(selling-13, belongings-16) poss(mother-19, her-18) poss(estate-21, mother-19) prep_from(selling-13, estate-21)

entry.sentence: On the countess 's advice , she had the money she received for this transferred to a bank in Gotha .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN On) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS countess) (POS 's)) (NN advice))) (, ,) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD had) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN money)) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD received) (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (DT this)) (VP (VBN transferred) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN bank)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NNP Gotha))))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(countess-3, the-2) poss(advice-5, countess-3) prep_on(had-8, advice-5) nsubj(had-8, she-7) root(ROOT-0, had-8) det(money-10, the-9) dobj(had-8, money-10) dobj(received-12, money-10) nsubj(received-12, she-11) rcmod(money-10, received-12) prep_for(received-12, this-14) partmod(this-14, transferred-15) det(bank-18, a-17) prep_to(transferred-15, bank-18) prep_in(bank-18, Gotha-20)

entry.sentence: Gotha was the nearest town in the vicinity of Alteichen Castle .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Gotha)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJS nearest) (NN town)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN vicinity)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNP Alteichen) (NNP Castle))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(town-5, Gotha-1) cop(town-5, was-2) det(town-5, the-3) amod(town-5, nearest-4) root(ROOT-0, town-5) det(vicinity-8, the-7) prep_in(town-5, vicinity-8) nn(Castle-11, Alteichen-10) prep_of(vicinity-8, Castle-11)

entry.sentence: Rosemarie sent her superfluous things to Alteichen Castle and kept only what she needed until July .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VP (VBD sent) (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS superfluous) (NNS things)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NNP Alteichen) (NNP Castle)))) (CC and) (VP (VBD kept) (ADVP (RB only)) (SBAR (WHNP (WP what)) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD needed) (PP (IN until) (NP (NNP July)))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(sent-2, Rosemarie-1) nsubj(kept-10, Rosemarie-1) root(ROOT-0, sent-2) poss(things-5, her-3) nn(things-5, superfluous-4) dobj(sent-2, things-5) nn(Castle-8, Alteichen-7) prep_to(sent-2, Castle-8) conj_and(sent-2, kept-10) advmod(kept-10, only-11) dobj(needed-14, what-12) nsubj(needed-14, she-13) ccomp(kept-10, needed-14) prep_until(needed-14, July-16)
